home.tagline: Create quizzes, take tests, and track results — all in one place.
home.devBlog: Dev blog about fixes and additions to the project
home.about1: Quizz is an intellectual entertainment game or test where participants answer questions from various fields of knowledge to score maximum points.
home.about2: We have implemented the ability to create quizzes, conduct them, and view results, among many other features. The project is under active development.

home.howToStart: Submit a registration request and wait for administrative approval. Once a role (student or teacher) is assigned, you can start using our service. Logging into your account will automatically take you to your dashboard.
home.firstRequestWarning: Processing your first request may take up to 50 seconds.

auth.error403: Account not activated. Please wait for approval.
auth.successRegister: Registration request sent! Please wait for administrative approval.
auth.errorAlready: A user with this name or email already exists or is pending approval

info.faqIntro: Answers to popular questions about the system.

faqItems.a1: Click the 'Login' button on the home page, then select 'No account? Register'. Fill out the form and wait for administrative approval.
faqItems.q2: How long does registration approval take?
faqItems.q3: How do I join a group?
faqItems.a3: A teacher will provide you with a group code. Enter it in your student dashboard to automatically join the group.
faqItems.q4: Can I take a quiz multiple times?
faqItems.a4: It depends on the quiz settings. A teacher can allow multiple attempts or limit it to one.
faqItems.a5: There is a theme switch (sun/moon icon) in the top right corner. Click it to toggle between light and dark themes.

privacyContent.p1: During registration, we collect: username, email, and the first and last name provided. When taking quizzes, your answers and results are saved.
privacyContent.p2: Data is used to identify users in the system, display results to teachers, and improve system performance. No data is shared with third parties.
privacyContent.p3: Data is stored on secure servers. Passwords are encrypted. You can contact administration for details. In case of a data breach, all users will be notified and required to change their passwords.
privacyContent.p4: We use localStorage to store theme settings and authorization tokens. Third-party cookies are not used.

termsContent.p1: Quizz is a testing system. By using the service, you agree to these terms.
termsContent.p2: Prohibited: using the service for illegal purposes, attempting unauthorized access to any systems/data, distributing malicious content, or attempting to disrupt the system. Such activity will result in a ban.
termsContent.p3: The administration is not responsible for the content of quizzes created by teachers.
termsContent.p4: Cheating, using outside help, sharing answers, or any other attempts to deceive during quizzes are prohibited. Teachers reserve the right to void results. The service can detect cheating, and teachers will be notified upon detection.
termsContent.p5: We may update the terms of use. The current version is always available on this page.

info.contactIntro: Have questions, suggestions, or complaints? Write to us.
info.contactDisclaimer: The administration will see the sender info (your account if logged in, IP address, device name, and browser).
info.contactSent: Message sent! Thank you for your feedback.
